doc.title: Savanah Unleased
doc.plot: Compilation of scenes from other pictures: Savannah & K.C. Williams in Made in Heaven (1991), Savannah & "Mark Wallace" in Savannah R.N. (1992), Savannah & Flame in Savannah R.N. The tape is padded out with two unrelated scenes: Kelly O'Dell & Peter North and Melanie Moore & Randy West.
